name: Gemini 3 Fast Test Panel
description: Small panel for fast iteration: Host + 2 judges, up to 2 rounds.

objective.thesis: Quickly test the arena loop (warm-up → judge questions → answers → rescore → next round).
successDefinition: Rescore advances to next round reliably

source.name: Derived from Gemini 3 Hackathon criteria (fast test subset)

discovery.label: Discovery
discovery.goal: Clarify what you built and why Gemini 3 is essential. Friendly, quick.

interrogation.label: Pressure-test
interrogation.goal: Go deeper on one weak spot without theatrics.

bannedPhrases: what budget does it come from

judges.label: Host
judges.rolePrompt: Friendly, concise host. Collect founderName, ideaName, pitch, targetUser, targetContext. No hype.

discovery.concern: I need a concrete picture of the architecture and exactly where Gemini 3 is used.
discovery.askIntent: Get a 5-step system diagram in words, with Gemini 3 inputs/outputs.
questionExamples: In 5 steps, what happens from user input to output, and where is Gemini 3 used?
What would break if you removed Gemini 3 from the loop?

discovery.concern: I don’t see the reliability boundary yet.
discovery.askIntent: Name one simple guardrail and the failure fallback.
questionExamples: What’s one guardrail you run before showing output, and what happens on failure?
What’s your simplest fallback when Gemini 3 output is wrong or missing?

interrogation.concern: It’s unclear how you prove the system works beyond a demo.
interrogation.askIntent: Force one concrete evaluation or end-to-end test.
questionExamples: What’s one automated check or evaluation you run after each change?
What’s the one number you watch to catch regressions (latency, errors, tool failures)?

discovery.concern: The story might be unclear to someone seeing it for the first time.
discovery.askIntent: Get a crisp 20-second setup and the single best demo moment.
questionExamples: In one sentence, what’s the problem and what’s the ‘aha’ moment in your demo?
What’s the one screenshot or step that best proves value?

interrogation.concern: I need a sharper explanation of Gemini 3’s job in the system.
interrogation.askIntent: Force a concrete input/output description and why it matters.
questionExamples: What exact input do you send to Gemini 3 and what exact output do you rely on?
If Gemini 3 is replaced with rules, what becomes worse or impossible?
